TextLibrary.Text: Queen Gwendholyn
Your Majesty, I have a reply from the Emperor. I apologize for the delay.
Your Majesty, I have a reply from the Emperor. I apologize for the delay.
Your Majesty, I have a reply from the Emperor. I apologize for the delay.
Your Majesty, I have a reply from the Emperor. I apologize for the delay.
No need. I know he is a difficult man to deal with. He asks a lot and gives little in return. What is his reply?
No need. I know he is a difficult man to deal with. He asks a lot and gives little in return. What is his reply?
No need. I know he is a difficult man to deal with. He asks a lot and gives little in return. What is his reply?
No need. I know he is a difficult man to deal with. He asks a lot and gives little in return. What is his reply?
He says that the Selentine Empire doesn't have any problems with the Undead as we do. And he has declined your request for aid. I'm sorry, your Majesty. I couldn't persuade him to change his mind.
He says that the Selentine Empire doesn't have any problems with the Undead as we do. And he has declined your request for aid. I'm sorry, your Majesty. I couldn't persuade him to change his mind.
He says that the Selentine Empire doesn't have any problems with the Undead as we do. And he has declined your request for aid. I'm sorry, your Majesty. I couldn't persuade him to change his mind.
He says that the Selentine Empire doesn't have any problems with the Undead as we do. And he has declined your request for aid. I'm sorry, your Majesty. I couldn't persuade him to change his mind.

Do not blame yourself. I did not really expect his help. The Selentines have done little to help Agaria since the times of your forefather Lord Albion, many centuries ago. In fact, they have often been more ready to wage war on us than to aid us.

What can we do now?
What can we do now?
What can we do now?
What can we do now?

I will call a council to determine our next step. But now, to your reward. I have a special gift for you. You can now join one of the five Orders of Knighthood. Come back later and I will have more to tell you.
